channel.title: Objectification on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Objectification on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: At What Point Do We Stop Thinking of Celebrities as People?
item.description: Miley Cyrus hasn’t been a person for long time. She used to be a person, then she was Hannah Montana, and now she’s a punchline. Kanye West is a punchline that has tried to fight for his personhood, and as a result become a punchline within a punchline.
